name: Yuca Frita
author: Kristen O'Brien
summary: This is a tasty Latin side dish, that I always enjoy making. It's a great alternative to french fries or potatoes. This is also great if your looking for a real, ethnic appetizer or tapa!
ingredients: 1 pound yuca root, peeled and sliced into French fries
directions: Heat the oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat
Place the yuca fries in the hot oil and fry until golden brown, about 20 minutes
Turn occasionally to brown them evenly
Remove from the skillet with a slotted spoon or spatula and season with salt
Squeeze lime juice over them if you like and serve immediately
